definition: good (virtuous)/benevolent/well-disposed/good at sth/to improve or perfect

sentences.english: It is when we trust in His goodness that we find gladness.
sentences.chinese: 相信他的良善，便能心生喜樂。

sentences.english: You should imitate great and good people.
sentences.chinese: 你應仿效偉大良善的人。

sentences.english: Why is it so many good, kind religious people suffer the tortures of the damned in their mind and body?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼這麼多良善信教的人們身心都受到邪祟的折磨？

sentences.english: And Jesus said unto him, Why callest thou me good?
sentences.chinese: 耶穌對他說，你爲什麼稱我是良善的。

sentences.english: The hindrances to obtaining these good qualities are the defilements such as hatred and so on.
sentences.chinese: 障礙我們得到這些良善品質的是象嗔恨等的各種染污。

sentences.english: For the fruit of the Spirit [is] in all goodness and righteousness and truth;
sentences.chinese: 光明所結的果子，就是一切良善，公義，誠實。

sentences.english: And that, I believe, is what true redemption is, Amir jan, when guilt leads to good.
sentences.chinese: 而真正的贖罪是從罪惡感中走向良善。

sentences.english: If someone is polite and kind, we think they are a servant.
sentences.chinese: 如果某人有禮物又良善，我們會認爲他們是僕人。

sentences.english: It is the absence of God's goodness and unashamed openness.
sentences.chinese: 這是缺少神的良善和不羞愧的開放性。

sentences.english: God is never properly thanked for his goodness than by our godliness .
sentences.chinese: 從來沒有比我們的虔誠更能表現對上帝良善的感恩。

sentences.english: He will bring us goodness and light.
sentences.chinese: 祂會帶給我們良善與光明。

sentences.english: That very goodness will have a beneficial impact on society.
sentences.chinese: 這種良善本身就會給社會帶來有益的影響。

sentences.english: Jesus meek and humble of heart, make my heart like unto Thine.
sentences.chinese: 良善心謙的主耶穌，讓我等之心仰合爾心。

sentences.english: His master replied, `Well done, good and faithful servant!
sentences.chinese: 主人說，好，你這又良善又忠心的僕人。

sentences.english: Recognize God and goodness in every face.
sentences.chinese: 認出每個人的神性與良善。

sentences.english: He made strong resolutions to serve as a worthy king under the kingship of God.
sentences.chinese: 他堅決表示，並在上帝的統治下作一位良善的君王。

definition: Renai or Jenai district of Keelung City 基隆市[Ji1 long2 shi4], Taiwan/Renai or Jenai township in Nantou county 南投縣|南投县[Nan2 tou2 xian4], central Taiwan
to do good works/to be merciful
to be of service to others/to help others/benevolent
Jente township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
